title: AWS Cloud Account Sync - The Run scenario option fails to complete
content:
If you configure the AWS endpoint with the same IAM credentials on multiple tenants, and schedule the Run scenario option on those tenants in parallel, the Run scenario option fails on the Endpoints page.

Cause

This issue occurs because the AWS APIs do not allow the same user to fetch account details in parallel.

Solution

Use any of the following solutions.

Solution 1

Use different IAM credentials to configure the AWS endpoints on multiple tenants.

Solution 2

Use the Run Scenario option one after the other on each tenant that shares the same IAM credentials.
